member.summary: The userAgent which shall be used in connections to Twitter (a must in the specs of the API)

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterStream.stopReceived

The stream or user stream options to intially use when starting the stream.

Starts the user stream.

member.summary: Gets or sets the stream options.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterStream.NetworkCredentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the Basic Auth Credentials.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.StreamOptions.Count
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of previous statuses to consider for delivery before transitioning to live stream delivery.
member.remarks: Currently disabled by Twitter. On unfiltered streams, all considered statuses are delivered, so the number requested is the number returned. On filtered streams, the number requested is the number of statuses that are applied to the filter predicate, and not the number of statuses returned.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.StreamOptions.Follow
member.summary: Gets or sets the user IDs that is to be referenced in the stream.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.StreamOptions.Track
member.summary: Gets or sets the keywords to track.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.StreamOptions.Locations
member.summary: Gets or sets the locations.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.StreamOptions.UseCompression
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to request the use of GZip compression on the stream.
member.remarks: Will use the recently introduced GZip compression to decrease bandwitdth.

member.name: P:Twitterizer.Streaming.UserStreamOptions.AllReplies
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to request all replies from the stream.
member.remarks: Will return all replies to a users stream (eg where the user doesn't follow both people replying to each other).

member.name: T:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent
member.summary: Describes the type of event that has occured on twitter

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Block
member.summary: The source user has blocked the target user.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Unblock
member.summary: The source user has unblocked the target user.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Favorite
member.summary: The source user has favorited the target users tweet.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Unfavorite
member.summary: The source user has unfaovorited the target users tweet.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Follow
member.summary: The source user has followed the target user.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.Unfollow
member.summary: The source user has unfollowed the target user.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListMemberAdded
member.summary: The source user has added the target user to the a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListMemberRemoved
member.summary: The source user has removed the target user from a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListUserSubscribed
member.summary: The source user has subscribed to a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListUserUnsubscribed
member.summary: The source user has unsubscribed from a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListCreated
member.summary: The source user created a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListUpdated
member.summary: The source user update a lists properties.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.ListDestroyed
member.summary: The source user deleted a list.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.UserUpdated
member.summary: The source users profile was updated.

member.name: F:Twitterizer.Streaming.TwitterSteamEvent.AccessRevoked
member.summary: The source users profile was updated.

member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the event.

member.summary: Gets or sets the source of the event. This is always the user who initiated the event.
